name: Hello, World! Hello, New Year!
description:
Hello, World! Hello, New Year! is a set of mini-games inspired by New Year's traditions from around the world.

Made for Weekly Game Jam 234: Happy New Year.

Asset credits:

  • Sound effects from zapsplat.com: fireworks, throwing pomegranate, pomegranate on door, breaking vase, grandfather clock, catching coins, losing coins
  • Pixel fonts from VEXED Font Bundle
  • Pixel art by me :)
  • Angry cat sound also by me (my first time recording my own SFX!)

Disclaimer: The games are inspired by traditions, but might not be accurate or true to the actual celebrations. Please don't take them as hard facts!
